title: Call History for Wear
summary: This application can look a call history in Android Wear.
developerAddress: 愛知県名古屋市中区大須3丁目2-15 栄南KTビル2F
description: This application can look a call history in Android Wear.In addition, you can call with a smartphone when you tap a call history.
descriptionHTML:
This application can look a call history in Android Wear.
In addition, you can call with a smartphone when you tap a call history.
comments: Works Great Just Need To Add One Change Works as expected, but need to have an option to display time in 12hr mode instead of 24hr.
Pretty good Needs cosmetic improvements, app pops open when accessing on wear device
